name: bible
description: Reference document for all things Uma Musume.

name: club_finder
description: A tool to find or track your club data.

name: friend_finder
description: A tool to lookup friends for parent (with affinity) and support cards.

name: guides
description: Bunch of guides including, Champ's Meet, Team Trials and other things.

name: rating_optimizer
description: A tool to optimize picking your skills for maxing ratings.

name: screenshot_combiner
description: A tool that combines your skill screenshots into one big screenshot.

name: skill_sheet
description: A spreadsheet with skills, their ratings and cost effectiveness.

name: stamina_calculator
description: A spreadsheet to calculate the needed stamina for a given race.

name: technical_document
description: Technical document for the more advanced players.

name: timeline
description: A timeline of upcoming events, CM, legend races and banners.

name: umalator
description: An updated race-skill simulator with uma saving, screenshot support and more.
